wlanName.title: WLAN Name
wlanName.description: The WLAN name may not be the same as the SSID in the WLC config...

model.title: Model
model.description: Model number to display in Homekit.

serial.title: Serial Number
serial.description: Serial number to display in Homekit.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: Specifies the number of milliseconds before the request times out. Default is 10000.
